findAvailablePlugins

public List<PluginManager.OfficialPluginDescription> findAvailablePlugins()
Returns a list of the names of all available official plugins. Right now this list is hardcoded but in future we could retrieve this list from emu or from freenet itself.

Returns:
A list of all available plugin names
